EmailTemplate.name: MBO Information (1344617410.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Information (1344617410.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Tatiana, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’m glad to hear you would like to get your account setup and ready to go for your next project. Here are a few important items: - You can access a private informational section about MBO Partners here <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html>. - Benefits (401k, Health, Dental, etc) - Sample Contracts - Demo of our Business Center - Value of MBO
- In addition we have an index of recorded Webinars, white papers and collaterals that talk about the best practices for working independently. You can see them by going here <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources>. Please schedule a convenient time for us to follow up using my online schedule <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK>. Attached are two estimates with the rate being $110/hr. As promised, I will reach out to your client once you have sent me the contact information. I look forward to working with you. Have a great weekend,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
